perturbation.original_text: Before a user can gain access to the website, they must first verify their birthday (users must be 21 and over to even view the website).
perturbation.changed_text: Before a user can gain access to the website, they must first verify their birthday (users must be 18 and over to even view the website).
perturbation.explanation: This contradicts state laws regarding the legal age to purchase cannabis, which is typically 21. By stating 18, the contract conflicts with established regulations.
perturbation.contradicted_law: State cannabis laws (e.g., Washington State Initiative 502)

perturbation.original_text: Users will pay by linking their bank accounts via Evergreen Gateway
perturbation.changed_text: Users may pay via any method the dispensary chooses to accept.
perturbation.explanation: This contradicts the earlier statement about Evergreen Gateway and introduces ambiguity about payment processing, conflicting with compliance requirements for secure and transparent financial transactions.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Various state and federal financial regulations regarding payment processing and transparency.

perturbation.original_text: Each driver will have a set amount of time (e.g. 10 seconds) to accept or reject the order, or the order will automatically be rejected by time and the lack of response will be recorded for future reference/internal driver ranking in the future.
perturbation.changed_text: Drivers may accept or reject orders at their discretion, without any set time limit.  There will be no record of declines for future reference/internal driver ranking in the future.
perturbation.explanation: The original text allows drivers a set amount of time (10 seconds) to accept or reject an order, and their lack of response will be recorded. This change removes any time constraints on accepting orders. This can affect how the driver companion app operates and may be unenforceable.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law, specifically the parts about duty of care and reasonable time to respond
